title: American Horror Story Weekly Wednesday Live Stream #18
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Mary, I can't wait for this evenings AHS Asylum! Congrats on the book release. :)
Coven remains my least favorite season. I liked the first 6 episodes but after that it just becomes a big convoluted mess.

yes, I agree, you all are awesome!  but I regret to inform you that I can no longer watch all your shows. 😠 Life has been crazy busy lately. I will be sure to purchase your book in the near future!  I have really enjoyed the shows! Hopefully soon, I can get back with you all! Peace for now! 👍
I can see Kathy Bates play Mother Superior.  I can see Anglea Basset played one of the fallen bad angles.
description:
Welcome to American Horror Story Weekly Wednesday Live Streams! Host is MaryGirl Moody. Special Guest: Maisie Andrews, Casey Soper, and Tami Sifford.
